roleset.name: wager

example.name: nominal proposition
example.text: Speculative investors, *trace* betting on an imminent clash between Ford and GM, pushed up Jaguar's share price...
example.arg: an imminent clash between Ford and GM

example.name: with amount
example.text: That would be a huge problem if it were to continue, because Unisys is betting its business on the assumption that customers want to move away from using operating systems that run on only one manufacturer's equipment and toward systems -- mainly Unix -- that work on almost anyone's machines.
example.arg: the assumption that customers want to move away from using operating systems that run on only one manufacturer's equipment and toward systems -- mainly Unix -- that work on almost anyone's machines

example.name: sentential proposition
example.text: That indicates speculators are betting a higher offer is in the wings.
example.arg: a higher offer is in the wings

roleset.note: Leave the complementizer (if present) out of the proposition argument.

example.name: sentential proposition and dollar amount
example.text: John bet his life that the stock market would never go down.
example.arg: the stock market would never go down

example.name: with co-better
example.text: Two years ago , a Canadian reader bet Omni Magazine $ 1,000 [*U*] that it could n't debunk the uncanny goings-on in `` the Oregon Vortex , '' a former Indian burial ground in southern Oregon .
example.arg: it could n't debunk the uncanny goings-on in `` the Oregon Vortex , '' a former Indian burial ground in southern Oregon
